articles.author: Kevin Mitchell
articles.title: Rafael Nadal defies pain and his father’s pleas to quit in epic win over Taylor Fritz - The Guardian
articles.description: Rafael Nadal prevailed over the American Taylor Fritz in a fluctuating five-set quarter-final at Wimbledon to set up a semi-final against Nick Kyrgios
articles.content:
Wimbledon 2022
  • Spaniard faces Kyrgios in semi after 3-6, 7-5, 3-6, 7-5, 7-6 (4) win
  • Nadal: The abdominal is not going well, it was not easy at all

articles.title: WNBA star Brittney Griner sends letter to President Biden pleading for his help - CBC Sports
articles.description: Brittney Griner has made an appeal to President Joe Biden in a letter passed to the White House through her representatives saying she feared she might never return home and asking that he not "forget about me and the other American Detainees."
